alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 11:31AM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches expected in the Hoback Basin near Bondurant. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest late this afternoon through Sunday morning, which is also when the highest snow rates are expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible around Pinedale. For forecast snowfall images, go to weather.gov/riverton/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
